mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_log (title, message, created_at, user_id, distinguish) VALUES (#{notification.title}, #{notification.message}, #{time}, #{friendId}, "NO")
INSERT INTO alarm_log (title, message, created_at, distinguish) VALUES (#{alarm.title}, #{alarm.message}, #{alarm.localDateTime}, "ALL")
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(id) as alarmId, title, message, created_at as createdAt FROM alarm_log al WHERE al.id NOT IN (SELECT alarm_id FROM alarm_delete) AND distinguish = "ALL" ORDER BY al.created_at ASC

SELECT DISTINCT(al.id) as alarmId, f.follower_id as myUserId, f.following_id as friendId, message, f.friend_status as friendStatus, created_at as createdAt FROM alarm_log al JOIN follow f ON f.alarm_id = al.id WHERE al.user_id = #{userId} AND al.distinguish = "NO" ORDER BY al.created_at ASC
mapper.delete: INSERT INTO alarm_delete (user_id, alarm_id) VALUES user_id = #{userId} AND alarm_id = #{alarmId}
